name: Maududi
text: Ta'. Sin. Mim.

name: Maududi
text: These are the verses of the Clear Book.

name: Maududi
text: (O Muhammad), you will perhaps grieve yourself to death because these people do not believe.

name: Maududi
text: If We will, We can send down a Sign to them from heaven, so their necks will be humbled to it.

name: Maududi
text: Never does there come to them an admonition from the Merciful Lord but they turn away from it.

name: Maududi
text: They will soon come to know the truth of that which they have been scoffing at.

name: Maududi
text: Do they not look at the earth, how We caused a variety of fine vegetation to grow from it (in abundance)?

name: Maududi
text: Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily Your Lord is Infinitely Mighty, Most Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: (Recount to them about the time) when Your Lord called Moses: "Go to the wrong-doing people,

name: Maududi
text: the people of Pharaoh: do they have no fear?"

name: Maududi
text: He said: "My Lord! I fear that they will brand me a liar.

name: Maududi
text: My breast is constricted and my tongue is not fluent, so endow Messengership on Aaron.

name: Maududi
text: As for me, they hold the charge of a crime against me. I fear they will put me to death."

name: Maududi
text: He said: "Certainly not! So go both of you with Our Signs. We shall be with you listening to everything.

name: Maududi
text: Go, then, to Pharaoh and say to him: 'The Lord of the Universe has sent us

name: Maududi
text: that you let the Children of Israel go with us.'"

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said: "Did we not bring you up among us when you were a child?

name: Maududi
text: You spent many years of your life among us and then you committed that deed of yours. You are very ungrateful indeed."

name: Maududi
text: Moses replied: "I committed that act erringly.

name: Maududi
text: Then I fled for fear of you. Then my Lord bestowed wisdom and authority on me and made me one of the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: Now this is the favour that you tauntingly remind me of: that you enslaved the Children of Israel!"

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said: "And who is this Lord of the Universe?"

name: Maududi
text: Moses answered: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth and of all that is between them, if you were only to believe."

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said to those around him: "Do you hear (what he says)?"

name: Maududi
text: Moses said: "(He is) Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers of yore."

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said to the audience: "This Messenger of yours who has been sent to you is simply mad."

name: Maududi
text: Moses continued: "(He is) the Lord of the east and the west, and all between them. If you only had any understanding!"

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said: "If you take any god other than me, I will certainly make you one of those (who are rotting) in prison."

name: Maududi
text: Moses said: "Even if I were to bring a Clear Sign to you?"

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said: "Then bring it if you are truthful at all."

name: Maududi
text: (No sooner had he said this than) Moses threw down his rod and behold, it was a veritable serpent,

name: Maududi
text: and he drew his hand (out of his armpit) and lo! it had become a shining object to the beholders.

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said to the nobles around him: "Surely this man is a skilled magician

name: Maududi
text: who wants to drive you out of your land by his magic. Tell us, what do you advise us?"

name: Maududi
text: They said: "Detain him and his brother for a while and send forth heralds to the cities

name: Maududi
text: to mobilise all skilled magicians."

name: Maududi
text: So the magicians were brought together on a particular day at a set time

name: Maududi
text: and the people were told: "Will you join the assembly?

name: Maududi
text: We may perhaps follow the religion of the magicians if they triumph."

name: Maududi
text: When the magicians came forth (for the encounter) they said to Pharaoh: "Is there a reward for us if we triumph?"

name: Maududi
text: He said: "Yes, you will then become those near-stationed to me."

name: Maududi
text: Moses said to them: "Throw down whatever you wish to throw."

name: Maududi
text: Thereupon they threw down their ropes and their rods, and said: "By the glory of Pharaoh, we shall prevail."

name: Maududi
text: Thereafter, Moses threw down his rod and behold, it went about swallowing up all the false devices they had contrived.

name: Maududi
text: Thereupon the magicians fell down in prostration,

name: Maududi
text: saying: "We (now) believe in the Lord of the Universe,

name: Maududi
text: the Lord of Moses and Aaron."

name: Maududi
text: Pharaoh said: "You accepted the word of Moses even before I granted you the leave to do so. Surely he is your chief who has taught you magic. Soon shall you come to know. I shall cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides and shall crucify all of you."

name: Maududi
text: They said: "We do not care, for we are bound to return to our Lord,

name: Maududi
text: and we surely expect that Our Lord will forgive us our sins for we are the first ones to believe."

name: Maududi
text: We revealed to Moses: "Set forth with My servants by night for you will be pursued."

name: Maududi
text: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to the cities (to mobilise troops)

name: Maududi
text: saying: "These (Israelites) are only a small band of people

name: Maududi
text: who have certainly provoked our wrath.

name: Maududi
text: But we are a numerous host, ever on guard."

name: Maududi
text: Thus did We drive them out of their gardens and springs

name: Maududi
text: and their treasures and excellent dwellings.

name: Maududi
text: This happened with them; (but on the other hand), We enabled the Children of Israel to inherit those bounties.

name: Maududi
text: At sunrise they set off in pursuit of them

name: Maududi
text: and when the groups came face to face, the companions of Moses cried out: "We are overtaken!"

name: Maududi
text: Moses said: "Certainly not. My Lord is with me; He will direct me."

name: Maududi
text: Then We revealed to Moses, (commanding him): "Strike the sea with your rod." Thereupon the sea split up, and then each became like the mass of a huge mount.

name: Maududi
text: We also brought the other party close to the same spot,

name: Maududi
text: and We delivered Moses and his companions, all of them,

name: Maududi
text: then We drowned the others.

name: Maududi
text: Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Ever Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: And recount to them the story of Abraham:

name: Maududi
text: when he asked his father and his people: "What do you worship?"

name: Maududi
text: They answered: "There are some idols that we worship and are devoted to them with constancy."

name: Maududi
text: He asked: "Do they hear you when you call them

name: Maududi
text: or do they cause you any benefit or harm?"

name: Maududi
text: They answered: "No; but we found our forefathers doing so."

name: Maududi
text: Thereupon, Abraham said: "Have you seen (with your eyes) those whom you have been worshipping,

name: Maududi
text: you and your forefathers of yore?

name: Maududi
text: They are all enemies to me; all, except the Lord of the Universe

name: Maududi
text: Who created me and Who guides me;

name: Maududi
text: Who gives me food and drink,

name: Maududi
text: and Who, when I am ill, heals me;

name: Maududi
text: Who will cause me to die and then will again restore me to life;

name: Maududi
text: Who, I hope, will forgive me my sins on the Day of Judgement."

name: Maududi
text: (And then Abraham prayed): "My Lord, endow me with knowledge and wisdom and join me with the righteous,

name: Maududi
text: and grant me an honourable reputation among posterity,

name: Maududi
text: and make me of those who will inherit the Garden of Bliss,

name: Maududi
text: and forgive my father for he is among those who strayed,

name: Maududi
text: and disgrace me not on the Day when people will be raised to life,

name: Maududi
text: the Day when nothing will avail, neither wealth nor offspring,

name: Maududi
text: but only he that brings to Allah a sound heart will (attain to success)."

name: Maududi
text: (On that Day) the Garden will be brought near to the God-fearing,

name: Maududi
text: and the Fire will be uncovered for those who strayed,

name: Maududi
text: and they will be asked: "Where are the gods that you worshipped

name: Maududi
text: beside Allah? Can they be of any help to you, or even be of any help to themselves?"

name: Maududi
text: Then the idols and those who strayed will be hurled into the Fire headlong, one upon another,

name: Maududi
text: and so too the hosts of Iblis, all of them.

name: Maududi
text: There they will quarrel with one another and the erring ones will say (to their deities):

name: Maududi
text: "By Allah, we were surely in clear error

name: Maududi
text: when we assigned to you a position equal to that of the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: It is none but those steeped in guilt who led us into this error,

name: Maududi
text: and now we have none to intercede on our behalf,

name: Maududi
text: nor do we have a truly sincere friend.

name: Maududi
text: If only we could return we would be among the believers."

name: Maududi
text: Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily Your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Ever Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: The people of Noah gave the lie to the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: Recall when their brother Noah said to them: "Do you have no fear?

name: Maududi
text: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you;

name: Maududi
text: so fear Allah and obey me.

name: Maududi
text: I seek of you no reward for this: my reward is with none except the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: So fear Allah and obey me."

name: Maududi
text: They answered: "Shall we accept you even though it is the meanest of people who follow you?"

name: Maududi
text: Noah said: "What knowledge do I have about their deeds?

name: Maududi
text: It is only for my Lord to take account of them. Would that you made use of your understanding!

name: Maududi
text: It is not for me to repel those who choose to believe.

name: Maududi
text: I am none but a plain warner."

name: Maududi
text: They said: "O Noah! If you do not desist, you will certainly become one of the accursed."

name: Maududi
text: He said: "My Lord! My people have branded me a liar.

name: Maududi
text: So pass a clear judgement between me and them and rescue me and the believers with me."

name: Maududi
text: Thereafter We rescued him and those who were with him in the laden Ark

name: Maududi
text: and drowned the rest.

name: Maududi
text: Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily Your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Ever Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: The Ad gave the lie to the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: Recall, when their brother Hud said to them: "Have you no fear?

name: Maududi
text: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you.

name: Maududi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Maududi
text: I seek of you no reward for this; my reward is with none but the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: What, you build a monument on every hill merely for fun

name: Maududi
text: and erect huge palaces as though you will live for ever,

name: Maududi
text: and when you strike you strike like tyrants?

name: Maududi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Maududi
text: Have fear of Him Who has provided you with all the (good) things you know;

name: Maududi
text: Who has provided you with flocks and children

name: Maududi
text: and with gardens and springs.

name: Maududi
text: I fear for you the chastisement of an Awesome Day."

name: Maududi
text: They replied: "It is all the same for us whether you admonish us or not.

name: Maududi
text: This has been happening all along.

name: Maududi
text: We will not be subjected to any chastisement."

name: Maududi
text: Eventually they gave the lie to him and We destroyed them. Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: The Thamud gave the lie to the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: Recall when their brother Salih said to them: "Have you no fear?"

name: Maududi
text: "I am a trustworthy Messenger to you.

name: Maududi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Maududi
text: I ask of you no reward. My reward is with none but the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: Do you believe that you will be left here to live securely in the present state

name: Maududi
text: amidst gardens and springs

name: Maududi
text: and cornfields and date-palms laden with juicy fruits?

name: Maududi
text: You hew dwellings in mountains and exult in that.

name: Maududi
text: Fear Allah and obey me

name: Maududi
text: and do not follow the biddings of those that go to excesses

name: Maududi
text: and spread mischief in the land rather than set things right."

name: Maududi
text: They replied: "You are nothing but one of those who are bewitched;

name: Maududi
text: you are no different from a mortal like us. So produce a sign if you are truthful."

name: Maududi
text: Salih said: "This is a she-camel. There is a day set for her to drink and there is a day set for you to drink.

name: Maududi
text: Do not molest her lest the chastisement of an Awesome Day should seize you."

name: Maududi
text: But they hamstrung her and then regretted it.

name: Maududi
text: So the chastisement seized them. Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily Your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: The people of Lot rejected the Messengers, branding them liars.

name: Maududi
text: Recall, when their brother Lot said to them: "Have you no fear?

name: Maududi
text: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you.

name: Maududi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Maududi
text: I seek of you no reward. My reward is with none but the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: What, of all creation will you go to (fornicate with) the males,

name: Maududi
text: leaving aside those whom Allah has created for you as your mates. Nay, you are a people that has transgressed all limits."

name: Maududi
text: They said: "O Lot! If you do not desist, you will be one of those expelled (from our towns)."

name: Maududi
text: He said: "I am one of those who abhor your practice.

name: Maududi
text: My Lord, deliver me and my family from their wicked deeds."

name: Maududi
text: Then We delivered him and all his family

name: Maududi
text: except an old woman who was among those that stayed behind.

name: Maududi
text: Thereafter, We utterly destroyed the rest,

name: Maududi
text: and We sent upon them a rain, an evil rain that fell on those who had been warned.

name: Maududi
text: Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily Your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: The people of Aykah also gave the lie to the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: Recall, when Shuayb said to them: "Have you no fear?

name: Maududi
text: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you.

name: Maududi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Maududi
text: I ask of you no reward for this. My reward is with none but the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: Fill up the measure and do not diminish the goods of people,

name: Maududi
text: weigh with an even balance

name: Maududi
text: and do not deliver short, and do not go about creating mischief in the land,

name: Maududi
text: and have fear of Him Who created you and the earlier generations."

name: Maududi
text: They said: "You are no more than one of those who have been bewitched,

name: Maududi
text: you are only a mortal like us. Indeed we believe that you are an utter liar.

name: Maududi
text: So cause a piece of the sky to fall upon us if you are truthful."

name: Maududi
text: Shuayb said: "My Lord knows well all what you do."

name: Maududi
text: Then they branded him a liar, whereupon the chastisement of the Day of Canopy overtook them. It was the chastisement of a very awesome day.

name: Maududi
text: Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

name: Maududi
text: Verily Your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate.

name: Maududi
text: Indeed this is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe;

name: Maududi
text: which the truthful spirit has carried down

name: Maududi
text: to your heart that you might become one of those who warn (others on behalf of Allah),

name: Maududi
text: (a revelation) in clear Arabic language,

name: Maududi
text: (a revelation embodied) in the scriptures of the ancients.

name: Maududi
text: Is it not a Sign to them - (to wit, the Makkans) - that the learned men of the Children of Israel know that?

name: Maududi
text: (But such is their adamance) that had We revealed it to one of the non-Arabs and even if he had recited (this clear Arabic discourse) to them

name: Maududi
text: they would still not have believed in it.

name: Maududi
text: Thus have We caused this (Admonition) to penetrate the hearts of the culprits (like a hot rod).

name: Maududi
text: They will not believe in it until they clearly see the grievous chastisement.

name: Maududi
text: But when it comes upon them suddenly, taking them unawares,

name: Maududi
text: they say: "Can we be granted some respite?"

name: Maududi
text: Do they really want Our chastisement to be expedited?

name: Maududi
text: Did you consider that if We were to let them enjoy life for many years

name: Maududi
text: and then the chastisement of which they were being warned were to come upon them,

name: Maududi
text: of what avail will be the provisions of life which they have been granted to enjoy?

name: Maududi
text: We never destroyed any habitation but that it had warners

name: Maududi
text: to admonish them. We have never been unjust.

name: Maududi
text: The satans did not bring down this (Clear Book),

name: Maududi
text: nor does it behove them, nor does it lie in their power.

name: Maududi
text: Indeed they are debarred from even hearing it.

name: Maududi
text: So do not call any other god beside Allah lest you become of those who will be punished,

name: Maududi
text: and warn your nearest kinsmen;

name: Maududi
text: and be meek to the believers who follow you.

name: Maududi
text: Then if they disobey you say to them: "I am quit of what you do."

name: Maududi
text: And put your trust in Him Who is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate,

name: Maududi
text: Who observes you when you rise (to pray)

name: Maududi
text: and observes your movements among those who prostrate themselves.

name: Maududi
text: He is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

name: Maududi
text: O people, shall I tell you on whom it is that satans descend?

name: Maududi
text: They descend on every forgerer steeped in sin,

name: Maududi
text: on those who whisper hearsay in the ears of people; and most of them are liars.

name: Maududi
text: As for poets, only the wayward follow them.

name: Maududi
text: Do you not see that they wander about in every valley

name: Maududi
text: and say things which they do not act upon,

name: Maududi
text: except those who believed and acted righteously and remembered Allah much, and when they themselves were subjected to wrong, they exacted retribution no more than to the extent of the wrong? Soon will the wrong-doers know the end that they shall reach.
